message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $140?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though! I can do $160, which is a great deal considering the value this product brings.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $150 to see if we can reach an agreement.

I'm glad we're getting close, Bob! I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I can do $165, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
